title: Illaoi's E is the most un-fun thing in LoL to play against. Red response would be nice.
body:
Instead of screaming and raging, I'll make my case.

I'd like to simply request that her/his E is changed. Somehow. Some way. I'm not a designer, I'm just a player... but I want to quit the game after being hit by a single e and then losing lane because of it. The moment Illaoi kills your spirit, unless that player is VERY bad, you just lost lane. Period. You have to go and heal (because that hurt a lot), fight tentacles on your way back to lane (which costs you time and lets illaoi farm) and play so passively that you might have to mis out on minion exp.

I understand that you can dodge it. I really do. But being able to dodge an ability doesn't make it fair or fun. In all likelihood, I might quit playing toplane simply because I don't want to afk. 

Can anything be done about this? Anything? I wold love a rioter response simply so that I can be informed if any changes are currently planned, or if for some god forsaken reason the balance team deems illaoi's e balanced. To be clear, I don't care at all about the other 3 abilities.

A response would be appreciated, as I don't think I'm the only player that feels this way.

once you master the clone illaoi becomes really useless, the only thing to watch out for is when she pops her ult it doesn't matter how far ahead you are that ult will ruin your life so its best to just wait for it to run out, nimbus strike in, auto, q, ulti and she'll just die if you rush bc

The biggest problem? There is no good choice.

Blitz pull you? Ok. You can fight him back if he is alone (generally he is full tank with low damage), you can flash/displacement.  Either running away or fighting are decent choices.

If you are hit by Illaoi, you are f****.  
Wanna fight?  She deals a lot of damage and has a sustain, trading isn't a problem.  If you are melee her aoe Q will hit you and the clone, dealing +30% damage (in low levels). In a skill that is 180 + 200% AD, that hurts pretty bad. (if there are more tentacles, good luck, because W will hit hutr even more).

If you run she gets free jabs at you and you can't B at all. Every tentacle get two hits to be killed. If you plan to destroy it remove the vessel you'll need 1,5 sec or more if you are playing something tanky since you can't throw skills at it, leaving you a tight gap of 0,5 second for B (8 second for a B). Each tentacle spawns at 10 sec. For a full minute. Why kill 3? Why do players have to be punished so hard dedicating 40~60s of game play just to dodge and kill tentacles? Feels like playing WOW. Farming tentacles. Sure it gives you gold but will ruin your farming if you concentrate on that.

A while ago a red said that dota blood seeker rupture was failed in design. There were no good choices. Now they release something with the same problem. 

Killing the tentacles means almost nothing for her. Shaco has huge cd on his boxes, heimer has a charge system and CD, zyra too.  She get free tentacles every 20~12 second, for no mana cost.

Why can't creeps kill them? Creeps kill shaco's box, heimer turrets, and if  I remember right, zyra plants too. 

Illaoi is just toxic.

she's not the first with an ability you have to dodge and if you don't you're done seriously are these people new here? I've only played about a year and Ik alot of champs that if they land that one ability you're pretty much screwed Don't act like it's new cuz it's not its just a game why is dodging a skillshot all of a sudden such a burden to people it wasn't something people complained about too much(from what I've seen) til now
Getting hit by Blitz arm is about as likely to result in your instant death as getting cursed by Illaoi's E, and Blitz's arm is a faster skillshot with more range.

most people think ahri is broken so take that for what you will and, once again, a blitz hook is only bad if someone else if there to jump on you when you get pulled. if illaoi e's your adc and her whole team kills it at max rank they'll take 45% + 8% every 100 ad illaoi has. now for the next 60 seconds or 3 tentacles that adc cannot do anything because they'll be spawning tentacles that synergize with her ult and w. if blitz pulls someone with his team close, they'll die. if illaoi pulls someone with her team close, that vessel becomes a liability to have close in a team fight

Once you get hit with it, hit her back. Then you won't become a vessel and your spirit will stay around for less time, plus you will get some harass on her like that.
Also, think about it this way, Illoai has nothing she contributes to herself, teamfights, and her team besides damage. She is basically an all in damage tank. So if she tries to go in on you, dodge all her skill shots the best you can and go in on her. Try not to fight on her tentacles, and you will be golden. She is fine the way she is.

She is really easy to fight against.
